reviews.name: Sarah Johnson
reviews.text: Absolutely addictive! The bug-whacking mechanics are so satisfying. I love how strategic you need to be to hit those fast-moving targets.

reviews.name: Mike Chen
reviews.text: Perfect casual game for quick breaks. The fast-paced action is so satisfying and the controls are intuitive. Highly recommend!

reviews.name: Emma Davis
reviews.text: Great game to test your reflexes. The bug variety keeps it interesting and the gameplay is simple yet challenging. Love it!

reviews.name: Alex Thompson
reviews.text: This game is pure fun! The whacking mechanics with different bug types is such a unique twist. Can't stop playing!

reviews.name: Lisa Wang
reviews.text: Simple controls but deep strategy. I love trying to beat my high scores and the precision aiming is so satisfying!

reviews.name: David Rodriguez
reviews.text: Amazing game! The quick reflexes required are challenging but rewarding. Perfect for both quick sessions and longer play.
